name: Sat_variableTest
description: Unit tests for the Sat.Variable class, focusing on variable creation, retrieval, and ID increment.

test_cases.name: testVariableCreation
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a Sat.Variable and verifies its properties.

test_cases.name: testVariableRetrieval
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of a Sat.Variable and verifies that the same instance is returned for the same name.

test_cases.name: testVariableIdIncrement
test_cases.description: Tests the increment of the ID property for each new Sat.Variable created.
